column4: Is there any virtulization software that will run windows near full speed as if only xp was running?
parallels or vmware, but you need a ton of memory

I have 2 gig of ram, on a nvidia 7950gs card.. but vmware of course wont even attempt to run f.e.a.r, lol, I was hoping something like xen might work.  I tried parallels, but even though it installed, and configuered, for some reason the drivers wouldn't load, and I gave up
nothing works with 3d acceleration yet. So pretty much no modern games will run in any VM.
